head.title: Celeste P. Colyer Planning to Wed

hedline.hl1: Celeste P. Colyer Planning to Wed

block.p: September wedding plans for Celeste Patricia Colyer and Peter Cornelis Boele have been announced by her parents, Patricia Benedict Colyer of Greenwich, Conn., and John M. Colyer Jr. of New York.
Miss Colyer, 28 years old, graduated from Boston University. She runs her own gift-shopping service in New York. Her father owns a real-estate and investment company in New York.
September wedding plans for Celeste Patricia Colyer and Peter Cornelis Boele have been announced by her parents, Patricia Benedict Colyer of Greenwich, Conn., and John M. Colyer Jr. of New York.
Miss Colyer, 28 years old, graduated from Boston University. She runs her own gift-shopping service in New York. Her father owns a real-estate and investment company in New York.

Mr. Boele, also 28, graduated from Clark University in Worchester, Mass., and is a program director at the Institute for Applied Economics in New York. He is a son of Mr. and Mrs. Geert-Jan Boel-Eschauzier of Rotterdam, the Netherlands. His father heads Merode B.V., a family investment and real-estate concern in Rotterdam.
